other_tests.findings: Homozygous c.309C/H11022A substitution in the LEP gene resulting in a p.N103K mutation.
Detected high levels of circulating leptin in both siblings; Patient A: 250 ng/mL, Patient B: 270 ng/mL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Leptin levels recorded before and after treatment: Patient A's leptin levels went from 59.7 ng/mL (Day 0) to 64 ng/mL (Week 8), while Patient B's levels decreased from 74.6 ng/mL (Day 0) to 20.4 ng/mL (Week 8).

other_tests.findings: Led to improvement in hyperphagia and weight loss.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Weight decreased from 77.9 kg to 71.7 kg for Patient A and from 50.4 kg to 46.6 kg for Patient B after the start of treatment.
